TopicTitle: Does anybody know if there are any flotation device mods?

Articles.Content: I\'m looking for a mod that has a ring of inflatables on the bottom of the Command Module for looks after splashdown.

hmm.

i dont know about that, but there is the Novapunch RCS fuel tanks that sorta looks like that.

if you want somthing to float, try the hstw amphibious gear and drone.
Nomad made an excellent one. Ask him.
